assessments.status_rationale: No FOMC decision reported in today’s bullets that would confirm a ≥25 bps cut vs the level in effect on 2026-01-14; deadline is 2026-06-30.
Today’s news does not include the September 2026 Core CPI-U y/y print; the referenced release is not due until 2026-10-15.
No bulletin reports an OFAC Iran-related human-rights sanctions package designating ≥10 parties tied explicitly to protest repression; deadline is 2026-04-30.
No item indicates the U.S. government publicly named (or jointly announced) a Gaza-administering Palestinian committee with ≥5 named members; deadline is 2026-03-31.
Today’s bullets contain no report that South Korean prosecutors have formally indicted former president Yoon Suk Yeol for the alleged martial-law bid; deadline is 2026-06-30.
No news bullet indicates Japan’s Prime Minister announced dissolution of the House of Representatives and set a snap-election date; deadline is 2026-05-31.
No earnings-guidance change is reported here, and the comparison window (between Meta’s 2026 Q1 and 2026 Q2 earnings releases) has not been evidenced in today’s bullets; deadline is 2026-08-05.
The relevant Q1 2026 bank earnings releases and their FICC trading revenue figures are not provided in today’s news bullets; deadline is 2026-05-15.
Today’s market coverage notes oil prices falling amid Iran-related tensions, but provides no evidence of ICE Brent front-month settling ≥$95 on any day; deadline is 2026-06-30.
No FDA 510(k) clearance or De Novo grant for an AI/ML hematology/peripheral blood smear morphology interpretation device is mentioned in today’s bullets; deadline is 2026-12-31.
